headline: GTA Online
subtitle: BRAVADO BUFFALO EVX
content:
Want the glory days of Americana back without undermining your eco credentials? Say no more. Meet the gruffest, roughest, meanest piece of American muscle with a doctorate in environmental science and an all-electric heart.

Old school fashion. New age sensibilities. It’s the perfect formula. The Buffalo EVX is now available from Legendary Motorsport. Eligible for Hao’s Special Works upgrades.
